name: Horse Nation [Tumblr post icons]
description:
Tumblr 'new post' dashboard icons featuring Horse Nation's FEI entry.

“They rejected our entries,” said Wylie of Horse Nation. “I don’t get it. I guess they didn’t understand our artistic vision.”
additional_info:
A FEI spokesperson explained, “With all due respect, Horse Nation’s submission was the worst thing the FEI has ever seen.” “It was like a six-year-old ate a box of crayons and then threw up all over our computer screen,” the FEI spokesperson continued. “We’re looking for something a little more sophisticated.” http://www.horsenation.com/2012/04/15/horse-nation-disqualified-from-fei-pictogram-contest/
Inspired by style 88994 by user 192778. (Which doesn't look at all like regurgitated crayons, so you'll likely prefer it to this style.)
